alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jones, east central Lenoir, northwestern Craven and west central Beaufort Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Barnwell, or 13 miles east of Kinston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Vanceboro, Askins, Fort Barnwell, Jasper, Tuscarora, Rhems, Wyse Fork, Ernul, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Fairfield Harbour, Bridgeton, Dover and Cove City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Southern Craven
